alert.note: Alert for Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:43AM MST until January 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 6000 feet MSL with 1 to 3 inches in lower valleys. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...South Hills and Albion Mountains including but not limited to Albion, Almo, and City of Rocks NR. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and hazardous backcountry travel conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.
